first_story_block: You open the back door into the house and go inside. You're in a combined kitchen and living room. You see several cupboard doors are hanging open, a fridge and several couches around a TV.

action_results.result: You go through cupboards and find a few cans of beans. You pull the them out and place them on the counter. You hear the other guy rummaging through things upstairs.
You open the fridge and are greeted by a magnificent mold colony. However there are three bottles of water that can be saved.

action_results.action: put water on the kitchen counter
action_results.result: As you place the water on the counter you hear a shuffle and crash from upstairs. Muffled yelling from the man you entered the house with.
You quickly head up the stairs and enter the room with the open door. You the man cradling his hand and cursing.

"Was some sort of freaky looking rodent!! It bit me on my hand when I reached under the bed. I think it's still under there..." I tell him that i'm gonna lift up the bed if he will ready his crowbar to kill it. He nods in agreement.
You lift up the bed and wait for him to have some reaction. You watch him crouch down and use the crowbar to hit some boxes and bags.

action_results.action: ask him if he can see it
action_results.result: "I would say something if I did" he sasses back at you. Maybe it's in one of the boxes or bags trying to hide. You are starting to get tired holding up the bed.
He scoffs at you and begins to wail the crow bar on the boxes and bags. We don't hear anything or see anything.

action_results.action: tell him you need to place the bed back down
action_results.result: He pulls the boxes and bags out with the crowbar and places them to the side. He nods at you.
You both slowly look through boxes and bags. You find a hanger and use it to poke through things.
